remarks: Set of arrows of the category of categories (in a universe). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catcbas.c $e |- C = ( CatCat ` U ) $.
catcbas.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
catcbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
catchomfval.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
catchomfval $p |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( x Func y ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d U x y $.
$d ph x y $.
